channel.title: [help]How to fight npcs for experience on 508 server[help]
channel.description:
THIS IS NOT A TUTORIAL.
Im wondering how to make it so you can train off of NPC's and not objects for combat experience on 508 sources. I have been trying ALL day long to try and find a tutorial or just plainly figure it out for myself and i haven't gotten anywhere. If anyone knows please reply to this post or send me a pm or something lol. I have been trying for over 17 hours now... and no luck...

item.title: [help]How to fight npcs for experience on 508 server[help]
item.dc:creator: @nama nama
item.description:
@nama wrote:

try making a new file in player named NPCCpmbat.java, start off from there, and if you already have it, just add npc and do the melee method

	public int CombatXPRate = 100;
      public void GiveMeleeXP(Player p) {
      if(p.AttackStyle == 1) {
  		p.addSkillXP(500 * p.MeleeDamage * CombatXPRate ,0);
      } else if(p.AttackStyle == 2) {
   		p.addSkillXP(500 * p.MeleeDamage * CombatXPRate ,2);
      } else if(p.AttackStyle == 3) {
   		p.addSkillXP(500 * p.MeleeDamage * CombatXPRate ,1);
      } else if(p.AttackStyle == 4) {
   		p.addSkillXP((500 * p.MeleeDamage * CombatXPRate)/3 ,0);
   		p.addSkillXP((500 * p.MeleeDamage * CombatXPRate)/3 ,1);
   		p.addSkillXP((500 * p.MeleeDamage * CombatXPRate)/3 ,2);
      }
      p.addSkillXP((5 * p.MeleeDamage * CombatXPRate)/3 ,3);
   }

witch u can change your self:)
also you can add higher exp rate to this so u can get exp quicker.
if this helped rep me:)

Read full topic
item.source: [help]How to fight npcs for experience on 508 server[help]
